properties.name: zoo.autoUpdateInjectedSpringProperties
properties.description: whether to auto update spring placeholder or not.

properties.name: zoo.bootstrap.enabled
properties.description: enable injecting namespaces in bootstrap phase.

properties.name: zoo.bootstrap.namespaces
properties.description: namespaces to be injected during bootstrap phase, multiple namespaces should be comma-separated.

properties.name: zoo.bootstrap.eagerLoad.enabled
properties.description: enable zoo initialization before logging system initialization.

properties.name: zoo.override-system-properties
properties.description: enable zoo server config override system properties.

properties.name: zoo.cache-dir
properties.description: local cache directory. the default value on windows is 'c:\opt\data', while on mac/linux is '/opt/data'.

properties.name: zoo.config-service
properties.description: zoo config service address. if it's configured zoo client will not refresh config services from remote meta service.

properties.name: app.id
properties.description: zoo client app id. if it's empty zoo will only load public namespace configurations!.
